::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer looks over at Vamprah, thinking over her question. "Depends 
on what ya want, I guess. Only things Zardus calls us in for are 
battles and missions. All the scannin' and stuff is automated, but 
some bots just sit at the bridge. I guess you can use the labs or 
whatever, or go out spy on people. Whatever ya want, as long as it 
ain't against Zardus."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Vampah::
> 
> Vamprah moved in beast mode towards a corder she found a place 
where 
> she could rest, she took a confortale position there.
> 
> "Hey! I'm here... I didn't run away... I just like a place where 
can 
> I rest like vampires" she said.
> 
> In fact her golden eyes were shinning and everybody could see them.
> After a large silence she spoke again.
> 
> "What could I expect of this team? What can your team offer me?".
